description: Corporal Noa Marciano, 19, was abducted from a kibbutz in the 7 October Hamas attack on Israel.
maintext: More than 11,000 people have been killed in Gaza since then, according to the Hamas-run health ministry. Forty-six Israeli soldiers have been killed in the fighting inside Gaza over the same period, the IDF says.
title: Israel confirms death of soldier held hostage in Gaza
